info.title: Legal Document Access Levels - Read
info.description: This synchronous inbound service is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed in integration scenarios or other user interfaces. Access level is an attribute used for authorization checks in Enterprise Contract Management. This service contains access level and access level text nodes. Using this service, you can read the access levels maintained in its configuration.

x-sap-shortText: Use this API to read access levels for legal documents

values.text: Enterprise Contract Management and Assembly Integration(SAP_COM_0437)
[Integration to SAP Enterprise Contract Assembly(2OQ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2OQ " Link To BP ")
